medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient presented with high blood glucose values (250-300 mg/dl) during clinic follow-ups, along with polyuria, polydipsia, and nocturia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Weight gain began at 2 years, with hyperphagia and excessive weight gain noticed around puberty at 12 years. During the COVID-19 quarantine at 16, she gained 17 kg in 1 year. At 17 years, she presented with high blood glucose values with associated symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS).
medical_history.family_history: Her father has Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM).
medical_history.social_history: The patient attended a school for children with special needs. She was born in Egypt and moved to Qatar at the age of 9 years.
